text: Hassan Muhammad (born May 29, 1957), also known as Arabia Rizek, is an Egyptian-American DJ, rapper, and producer. He is one of the founders of breakbeat DJing. His first single "Push Me Up" (1981) reached number 48 on the U.S. pop albums chart. Rizek was born in Cairo, Egypt, he moved to the South Bronx, New York, with his family in 1968 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Egyptian musicians Category:American DJs Category:Arab-American rappers Category:Egyptian rappers Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:American electronic musicians Category:American hip hop musicians Category:Musicians from the Bronx Category:People from Cairo Category:American activists Category:American dance musicians Category:21st- century American rappers Category:21st-century American musicians
title: Arabia Rizek
